sys_metadata_link.payload:
true 834f07841be200105c01dd3cdc4bcbb8 not requested 2020-01-20 09:15:56 6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441 Objective

Get hands-on experience with SOAP Messages in workflows.

 

 

Estimated Time To complete

5 hour

 

 

Knowledge Required

SOAP Messages, SOAP Message workflow activity

Review related articles in wiki

 

 

Test Case

Terms: 

Customer Instance: your instance

Target Instance: aspedienssandbox (or any other)

Customer wants to have a Catalog Item in Customer Instance that will allow User creation in target instance. Catalog Item form should include: First Name, Last Name, Email address, user name (mandatory) of the user to be created in target instance (all text fields). Also customer wants to have "Role" variable where end user will be able to specify the role name to be granted to the new user in target instance.

The workflow behind this catalog item should place SOAP request to target instance that will  do the following:

1) Check if user specified user name already exists in target instance. If that is the case then RITM running the workflow in Customer instance should be closed with state "Closed Incomplete" with no action in target instance

2) Check if role name specified by the user in RITM is valid. If invalid (does not exist) then RITM running the workflow in Customer instance should be closed with state "Closed Incomplete" with no action in target instance

3) If both (#1 and #2) steps are validated then target instance should

 

  • a) Create the user 
  • b) Assign  that user a role

 

4) At the end RITM in Customer Instance should be set to state = "Closed Complete" provided user was successfully created and role was assigned.

 

 

 

Trainee  Instructions

[2017-07-24] Do not use the workflow activity "SOAP Message", as it doesn't work for this purpose. Use "Run script" instead.

In Jakarta,SOAP and REST Message activities are deprecated

Trainee should propose the technical design and get approval from Coach before implementing the solution. After approval please implement it in the instance specified by the Coach using separate update set. Perform the unit testing before reporting task as completed to the Coach.

 

 

Coach Instructions

Review the development done and test according the scenarios. Demonstrate SOAP Message Function automatic generation  from loaded WSDL. Disscuss what issues may prevent SOAP Request to be executed. If possible, simulate the SOAPMessage failure (inactivate or rename web service on the target instance) and see how workflow reacts.
